title: bnbflow
author: bnbflow
content: BNBFLOW is ready to give you 0.0055BNB daily for free!Everything is simple: Create a business and get the profits from the bank on time, so that your revenues don’t stop coming in. Buy new levels and earn even more Binance Coins.FEATURES- The first level is free for everyone- No registration required- Partnership program - 12% from referral’s earnings- Quick payouts and depositsJoin and play right now! https://bnbflow.orgSocial media:https://t.me/bnbfloworghttps://twitter.com/bnbfloworg

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I didn't understand anything, what do you mean by: create a business and get profits from the bank on time? what does the site get? Sounds like a ponzi scheme to me, I could be wrong but this is the first impression I have of this site. well some other things that I find strange:1 - The site is using the binance exchange or BNB logo when the site does not belong to binance2 - the site is giving away BNB free, this doesn't sound good because there's no way this can be sustainable in the long term

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: bnbflow on May 17, 2022, 09:01:27 PMBNBFLOW is ready to give you 0.0055BNB daily for free!..At the expense of which fund do you distribute 0.0055 BNB daily for free? I have an assumption that this is done at the expense of those investors who joined this project earlier, buying levels. Thus, we see that this project is a classic ponzi scheme.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: I just take a look to the site and now it's down.looks like the ponzy owner decided to walk away with the investors money.  The last payment was done 57 days ago, so, all the investors here can say good bye to their investments.Is important to mention that OP haven't been online since May 28, 2022, 06:12:02 PM. So, this ponzi it's over.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on July 24, 2022, 06:28:24 PMI just take a look to the site and now it's down.looks like the ponzy owner decided to walk away with the investors money.  The last payment was done 57 days ago, so, all the investors here can say good bye to their investments.Is important to mention that OP haven't been online since May 28, 2022, 06:12:02 PM. So, this ponzi it's over.as expected, the site did not last more than 3 months, I even doubt that it lasted more than 7 days, in the past ponzi sites had more durability because they had customers, currently with this financial crisis and with so many serious and honest investments and with so many people who already know the danger of using ponzi sites, today ponzi sites can't even have more than 10 customers and even those less than 10 customers make small deposits. I think OP closed the ponzi site because he saw that he wouldn't have customers and he was already wasting his time with this site
